about: I am a dedicated, hard-working individual who is always in pursuit of knowledge to further my skills and abilities and therefore communicate well with others and keep an open mind, constantly creating opportunities to learn from others
Coding quickly became a passion for me and is the career path I have dedicated my life to, with the determination to go as far as I possibly can in the Information and communication technology sector

education.description: I completed N1 and N2 Mechnical Engineering Studies
I Qualified as a Mechanic with 2 and a half years of experience in the workplace, through which I learned valuable soft skills.
education.place: College Of Cape Town and Various Workshops

education.description: I am currently studying at life choices as a web developer

work.description: I started at Life Choices studios where I began upscaling myself
I worked as a mechanic at Classic car consortium, through which I also gained experience in customer relations
work.place: Classic Car Consortium (Previously: Steve Marsh Classic Autos)

skills.title: CSS
skills.experience: I am proficient at CSS with a decent knowledge base of it as I love design and animations, with plans to consistently further my knowledge

skills.title: Bootstrap
skills.experience: I have been using bootstrap in almost every single project I have created due to efficiency

skills.title: Javascript
skills.experience: I am knowledgeable with JavaScript with plans to further expand my knowledge of JS and use it to reach new heights in Development

skills.title: VueJs
skills.experience: I am proficeint in Vue with Plans to further increase my knowledge and skill in it

skills.title: NodeJs
skills.experience: I am well versed in Node with the prospect of growing my knowledge of it

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quotes: Damon is a creative, curious, and well-behaved individual who always prioritizes his work. He excels in collaborating with others and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap. Including Git and GitHub.

testimonials.name: Asithandile
testimonials.quotes: Damon is an exceptional ambitious and charismatic colleague, with an unwavering work ethic. His hardworking nature and remarkable problem-solving skills make him an invaluable asset to any team.

testimonials.name: Matthew
testimonials.quotes: Damon is an outstanding individual, whether is be his work or him as a person. Always pleasant to work with, always promotes positivity.He has unmatched enthusiasm and his determination and drive is out of this world. He has amazing communicative skills and has a cheerful and positive personality that always shines and his passion for what he loves is what will take him to new heights that we all know he can achieve. It is a privilege to have him as a work colleague but mainly as the best companion and closest friend.

testimonials.name: Aakeefah
testimonials.quotes: A skilled web developer who consistently delivers exceptional results. With a keen eye for detail and a knack for problem-solving, he ensures that projects are not only completed efficiently but also exceed expectations.

testimonials.name: Veronique
testimonials.quotes: Damon is a pleasure to work with. He takes pride in his work and perseveres through challenges, always keeping a positive outlook. In addition, He is great at communicating ideas to others and has displayed various other leadership qualities especially in a team capacity. He is always willing to help his peers and would go to any length to make sure others succeed too. I know he will make the most of every role and opportunity presented to him.

testimonials.name: Brandon
testimonials.quotes: Damon is a person that excels at everything he does whether it be coding, He shows the most brilliant and most unique ways to approach problems he will be a very unique asset in the industry of web development, he shows passion for anything he does, he is exeptionally hardworking and always showing outstanding results in improving his knowledge and himself, I am honored that I got a chance to work alongside Damon and proud to call him my friend.

testimonials.name: Unity
testimonials.quotes: Damon is an exemplary colleague, showcasing unparalleled dedication as a hard worker, unwavering reliability in meeting deadlines, and a consistent commitment to going above and beyond, making him an invaluable asset to any team or project.
